title: Replace all website images with attractive ones

requirements.text: Generate a new hero section background image with an elegant Indian ethnic fashion theme featuring rich colors and traditional textile patterns

quotes: change all images in this website into attractive ones

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays a visually appealing background image that complements the Indian ethnic fashion theme
Image maintains appropriate dimensions for hero section display
Image integrates seamlessly with existing hero section text overlay

requirements.text: Generate attractive category preview images for Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery sections on the home page

quotes: change all images in this website into attractive ones

acceptanceCriteria: Each category preview card displays a distinct, high-quality representative image
Images clearly represent their respective product categories
All four category images maintain visual consistency in style and quality

requirements.text: Generate fallback product images for each category (Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, Jewellery) to replace the current placeholder images

quotes: change all images in this website into attractive ones

acceptanceCriteria: Each category has a dedicated fallback image when product-specific images are unavailable
Fallback images are visually appealing and accurately represent their product categories
ProductCard component correctly displays category-specific fallback images

requirements.text: Update frontend components to render the newly generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: HeroSection component references the new hero background image
Home page category preview cards use the new category images
ProductCard component uses the new category-specific fallback images
All images load correctly from the static assets directory

constraints: Do not modify backend Motoko code or data structures
Do not change existing component logic or structure beyond image path updates
Maintain all existing functionality while updating image assets
nonGoals: Changing the overall design or layout of pages
Adding new product images to the database
